body:
It's a good idea. It makes the API easier to use. I don't think it is in scope for this issue though, because we are currently just using ordering primitives exposed by DRF, and to do what you propose we'd have to dig further into those. This PR just covers adding sorting to a particular endpoint.

Also, sorry for all the back and forth with CI. I swear I run tests locally most of the time... :face_with_head_bandage:
